kots.modpack.name: §bKumo O Tagayasu
§bUse Village Trade, Blaze Enchanter or Crysyalline Flower instead.
kubejs.tooltip.item.minecraft.golden_swo: §aThis tool is bound to the Forgmatica/Litematica mod.
kubejs.tooltip.item.chimes.bamboo_chimes: §aStand near the chimes, they'll ward off phantoms!
kubejs.tooltip.item.chimes.iron_chimes.0: §avStand near the chimes, they'll ward off phantoms!
kubejs.tooltip.item.chimes.carved_bamboo: §aStand near the chimes, they'll ward off phantoms!
kubejs.tooltip.item.chimes.copper_chimes: §aStand near the chimes, they'll ward off phantoms!
kubejs.tooltip.item.chimes.amethyst_chim: §aStand near the chimes, they'll ward off phantoms!
kubejs.tooltip.item.chimes.glass_bells.0: §aStand near the chimes, they'll ward off phantoms!
kubejs.tooltip.item.minecraft.anvil.0: §aRight-click the anvil with iron blocks to repair it!
kubejs.tooltip.item.minecraft.damaged_an: §aRight-click the anvil with iron blocks to repair it!
kubejs.tooltip.item.minecraft.chipped_an: §aRight-click the anvil with iron blocks to repair it!
kubejs.tooltip.item.upgrade_aquatic.boil: §aRestores oxygen when eaten — perfect for underwater exploration.
kubejs.tooltip.item.quark.grate.0: §aAnimals don't step on, while items fall through.
§aCan be placed out of thin air.
§aUseful as scaffolding when working high up.
§aHow to get: reach cloud level and right-click with a glass bottle.
kubejs.tooltip.item.quark.chute.0: §aItems entering via hopper or dropper fall straight out the bottom.
kubejs.tooltip.item.quark.chute.1: §aDisable with redstone signal or a block beneath.
kubejs.tooltip.item.quark.feeding_trough: §aNearby animals eat stored food (like pigs eating beets) to breed.
kubejs.tooltip.item.quark.seed_pouch.1: §aMatching seeds picked up go straight inside.
kubejs.tooltip.item.quark.seed_pouch.2: §aRight-click with seeds in inventory to load them.
kubejs.tooltip.item.quark.seed_pouch.3: §aRight-click the pouch to take out up to one stack.
kubejs.tooltip.item.quark.seed_pouch.4: §aRight-click farmland with it to plant directly.
kubejs.tooltip.item.quark.gravisand.0: §aTurns into a gravity block when powered. If blocked mid-fall, it becomes static again.
§aRandomly boosts one enchant level, but adds a curse.
kubejs.tooltip.item.biomemakeover.enchan: §aRestores half max health instantly and clears all debuffs.
kubejs.tooltip.item.biomemakeover.witch_: §aWear it, witches stay neutral. Unlocks witch quest system.
§aUnlocks or unbinds linked blocks, chests, or doors.
kubejs.tooltip.item.supplementaries.flut: §aRight or left-click a pet to bind.
§aCan call all nearby standing pets to you.
kubejs.tooltip.item.supplementaries.anti: §aUse on sign text to change to a vintage font.
kubejs.tooltip.item.minecraft.torch.0: §aAttacking mobs with it briefly sets them on fire.
kubejs.tooltip.item.l2complements.eterni: §aLeft-click to clear large patches of grass. Careful with crops!
kubejs.tooltip.item.tofucraft.bottle_soy: §aNuclear-powered soybean oil — mysterious alien tech. Can make Blaze Burner superheated.
kubejs.tooltip.item.etcetera.tidal_helme: §eOcean Heart diving helmet — a must-have for divers!
kubejs.tooltip.item.minecraft.iron_helme: §eGood thing I've got an iron head!
kubejs.tooltip.item.fruitsdelight.bayber: §eRed berries on green branches, shining bright.
kubejs.tooltip.item.fruitsdelight.lychee: §eA horse gallops, the princess smiles — it's lychee.
kubejs.tooltip.item.fruitsdelight.durian: §eLucky Newton wasn't hit by this one!
§eExuberant are peach blossoms. Brilliant are their lustre.
kubejs.tooltip.item.fruitsdelight.pineap: §eI have a pen, I have a pineapple~ En~ Pineapplepen~
§eRich in vitamin C, but not great raw.
kubejs.tooltip.item.vinery.cherry.0: §eCherries can symbolize many lovely things — even lively, energetic girls.
kubejs.tooltip.item.vinery.cherry.1: §eThey stand for love, happiness, and sweetness, with a deeper meaning of cherishing.
kubejs.tooltip.item.vintagedelight.centu: §eThis delicacy? Let them keep it for themselves!
kubejs.tooltip.item.vintagedelight.pickl: §eTop quality when the yolk is oily and red.
§ePickles go best with salo and vodka.
kubejs.tooltip.item.casualness_delight.s: §eUh… are they staring even in death?
kubejs.tooltip.item.youkaishomecoming.ra: §eFreshwater or saltwater eel — I'll take both.
kubejs.tooltip.item.youkaishomecoming.ch: §eA chest full of cream and honey.
kubejs.tooltip.item.youkaishomecoming.ud: §eAlso prized as decoration or fine cuisine.
§eBlooms only under a full moon, fades at dawn.
§eOn non–full moon nights, grows only to just before maturity.
kubejs.tooltip.item.casualness_delight.f: §eBan soggy fried chicken from plates — protect diners from new victims!
kubejs.tooltip.item.fruitsdelight.persim: §eI'm not a tomato! Not even close!
kubejs.tooltip.item.farmersdelight.mixed: §eA vegan mix! Perfect for light meals or a substitute dinner.
kubejs.tooltip.item.vintagedelight.cucum: §eLikely to show up in your diet plan.
kubejs.tooltip.item.candlelight.salad.0: §eLikely to show up in your diet plan.
kubejs.tooltip.item.bakeries.baguette.0: §eDay-old French baguette could be used as armor-piercing ammo.
kubejs.tooltip.item.casualness_delight.s: §eWe all snuck these behind our parents' backs.
kubejs.tooltip.item.crockpot.avaj.0: §eA mysterious liquid made by accident while brewing hot cocoa.
kubejs.tooltip.item.crockpot.milkmade_ha: §eWhy can a pot make a hat…?
kubejs.tooltip.item.crockpot.creative_mi: §eDrink milk in big gulps — glug glug glug…
kubejs.tooltip.item.artifacts.everlastin: §eI don't get why you eat this every day.
§eYou must be the adventurer who never farms.
kubejs.tooltip.item.artifacts.eternal_st: §eI don't get why you eat this every day.
§eYou must be the adventurer who never farms.
kubejs.tooltip.tag.forge.pasta.0: §7Noodles are carbs — eat too many and you'll get fat.
kubejs.tooltip.tag.forge.chocolate.0: §7Sweet and silky, with a lingering aftertaste.
kubejs.tooltip.tag.forge.fruits.lemon.0: §7Strong antioxidants, quenches thirst and cools you down.
kubejs.tooltip.tag.forge.fruits.blueberr: §7Sweet and sour, full of nutrients and benefits.
kubejs.tooltip.tag.forge.fruits.peach.0: §7So juicy and sweet it's called 'honey peach.'
kubejs.tooltip.tag.forge.fruits.pineappl: §7Loved for its unique flavor and nutrition.
kubejs.tooltip.tag.forge.fruits.cranberr: §7A tart red fruit with strong antioxidant power.
kubejs.tooltip.tag.forge.fruits.orange.0: §7Packed with value — almost everyone loves it.
kubejs.tooltip.tag.forge.fruits.lychee.0: §7A galloping horse, a princess's smile — it's lychee.
kubejs.tooltip.tag.forge.fruits.strawber: §7Sweet, juicy, and the superstar of berries.
kubejs.tooltip.tag.forge.fruits.hamimelo: §7A sweet melon, pairs well with citrus or savory foods.
kubejs.tooltip.tag.forge.fruits.grapes.0: §7Rich, versatile, colorful, fragrant, and delicious — a true gem among fruits.
kubejs.tooltip.tag.forge.fruits.persimmo: §7'Good for lungs and intestines' — a traditional medicinal fruit.
kubejs.tooltip.tag.forge.fruits.watermel: §7Green outside, red inside — fun and refreshing.
§7Fresh coconut meat is full of vitamins and minerals.
kubejs.tooltip.tag.forge.vegetables.onio: §7Watch out — propanethiol S-oxide will sting your eyes!
kubejs.tooltip.tag.forge.vegetables.chil: §7Spicy! Perfect for adding kick to any dish.
kubejs.tooltip.tag.forge.crops.olives.0: §7Eaten fresh or pickled — detoxifying, soothing, thirst-quenching, even sobering.
kubejs.tooltip.tag.forge.crops.adzuki.0: §7Medicinal use: reduces swelling, detoxifies, drains pus, eases jaundice.
kubejs.tooltip.tag.forge.crops.corn.0: §7A staple grain, vital for food, medicine, and more.
kubejs.tooltip.tag.forge.crops.currant.0: §7Contains 18 amino acids — often dried for pastries.
kubejs.tooltip.tag.forge.crops.pear.0: §7Cools and calms — helps with dizziness from high blood pressure.
kubejs.tooltip.tag.forge.crops.rice.0: §7The greatest food under heaven — harvest brings peace and plenty.
kubejs.tooltip.tag.forge.crops.mint.0: §7The world's most famous scent — minty fresh.
kubejs.tooltip.tag.forge.crops.aloe.0: §7Trusted for ages as a moisturizing skincare helper.
kubejs.tooltip.tag.forge.crops.carrot.0: §7Crisp, tasty, and nutritious — helps prevent heart disease and tumors.
kubejs.tooltip.tag.forge.crops.potato.0: §7A widely grown tuber — both veggie and staple food.
§7Sweet root veggie — great for salads or sugar.
kubejs.tooltip.tag.forge.crops.leek.0: §7Strong aroma — essential for cooking meat dishes.
kubejs.tooltip.tag.forge.crops.peanut.0: §7Rich in fat and protein — highly nutritious.
kubejs.tooltip.tag.forge.crops.cabbage.0: §7Versatile — perfect for salads, pickling, or stews!
kubejs.tooltip.tag.forge.crops.barley.0: §7A dark grain with earthy flavor, stronger than wheat.
kubejs.tooltip.tag.forge.crops.oat.0: §7Nutritious grain, full of fiber and protein — ideal for healthy diets.
kubejs.tooltip.item.majobroom.broom.0: §bThey say, if you enchant a broom with magic
kubejs.tooltip.item.majobroom.broom.1: §b…it can transform into a cute girl.
kubejs.tooltip.item.majobroom.majo_hat.0: §bMajo's hat whose style have passed down three generations.
kubejs.tooltip.item.majobroom.majo_cloth: §bMajo's cloth with the majo's brooch, which proofing a Majo.
kubejs.tooltip.item.minecraft.enchanting: §bUse Village Trade, Blaze Enchanter or Crysyalline Flower instead.
